content:
I am a Postdoctoral Researcher at the Max Planck Institute for Software Systems working with Prof. Rupak Majumdar and Prof. Sadegh Soudjani. Prior to this, I completed my PhD from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur under Prof. Indranil Saha. I have been a recipient of the Prime Minister Research Fellowship and the FARE Fellowship.
My research interest lies in the area of Learning-based Controller Synthesis. I work mostly in designing Safe, Robust and Efficient algorithms for Embodied AI systems.
